title: nf-core/seqinspector pipeline - params.fastq_screen_references schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.fastq_screen_references

name.errorMessage: The reference name as referred to by FastQ Screen.

dir.errorMessage: Path to the dir containing the aligner reference and index. Can be remote.

basename.errorMessage: The shared basename of the reference and index files contained in the dir.

aligner.errorMessage: Specify the aligner to use for the mapping. Valid arguments are 'bowtie', bowtie2' (default), 'bwa' or 'minimap2'.
